text: Burt Delavan (December 2, 1929 – August 15, 2013) was an American football tackle. He played for the Chicago Cardinals from 1955 to 1956. He died on August 15, 2013, in Carmichael, California at age 83. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2013 deaths Category:American football tackles Category:Menlo Oaks football players Category:Pacific Tigers football players Category:Chicago Cardinals players
title: Burt Delavan
